column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I don't know how on earth this place had so many good reviews. If it's ambiance and you're just brunching
column3: then I get it. The cocktails were okay. Burger was dry af
column4: I almost wanted to put water on my beef patty to wetten it up. The short ribs was okay
column5: every restaurant in the south has decided to go all in on these short rib entrees
column6: it's getting old fast. Especially when. It isn't cooked right
column7: low and slow please. Shirt rib shouldn't be this dry. It may have been prepared beginning of day and still served later. Anyway
column8: the girls loved it so I'm happy
column9: the guys however just had to drink it up and smile.
